r.s: Provides an easy way to perform HTTP requests
r.d: Supports GET/POST/HEAD/TRACE/PUT/DELETE, Basic authentication, Proxy, Proxy Authentication, SSL, file uploads etc.
r.n: * Added possibility to get reason phrase from HTTP response (request #12352) * PHP 4.2.0 should be the minimal PHP version (bug #12354), also updated other dependencies' versions to saner values * Send a Content-Length header in request even if body is empty (request #12900) * Do not pass length parameter to gzinflate(), it could cause problems in some corner cases (bugs #13135, #14370) * Return an error if trying to do a HTTPS request without OpenSSL support (bug #14127) * Do not stop reading chunked response body prematurely (bug #14200)
